phrases: Ill be by your side forever
No matter how the future tests us
I was able to meet you
If I am with you, then I can overcome them
Excite me on the contrary, but -
I only want to protect you
We were born in distant worlds
Ill be by your side forever
Let Us change any future into hope
Always, always look at me at all times
You looked away, did not you?
Ill punish those who are wavering and insolent
Because I will not listen to excuses
Touch me because I am tired
I love you, its a lie
I hate you, that is a lie, too
Nay nay nay, its useless, its a misunderstanding
So I will not say, I love you”
Non non non, because I absolutely will not forgive you
If you go to somewhere else
The truth is, I want to be by your side more than anyone else
Let Us go take a walk in chains of love!
I love the smell of humans burning.
I can only enjoy this during war.
I would like to borrow your strength.
My unit is filled with wild ones.
What do you want us to do?
You heard how Tristain and Germania captured our port, right?
And you are telling me to repel them?
No, I do not expect you to burn five hundred ships.
I do not like the roundabout conversations.
Tell me the place I get to burn.
Who do you think I am?!
I will have you stay in here for a while.
Because of what you had said.
In a real battle, your target moves!
I cannot imagine this is only training.
I will soon be gone from here.
Our Queen will be heading to the front line.
She will leave in seven days.
We, the Musketeer Force, will be going to Albion to protect Her Highness.
We will say farewell to this academy, too.
It is a shame I could not uncover the name of the person who razed Dungletale...
I will go to the front line, too.
I have to help the Princess.
I heard everything from this plebeian.
I cannot allow a daughter of the La Valliere family to go to war.
Besides, what good would come out of your going when you cannot use any magic?
I would definitely be of help!
War is not as simple as you think.
That is why I am going.
I am the only one who can protect the Princess.
Until you change your mind, I will not let you out of here.
Cool your head in here for a while.
Keep your eyes on Louise here.
Saito, you are going to take Eleonore-oneesama's side?
I am sorry, but I agree with your sister this time.
It is ridiculous for you to go to war.
Please provide this impudent girl with guidance.
Your sister is worried about you.
Though I am not good with magic, if it is for Her Highness, I could do anything.
I will defeat the enemy forces, too!
In other words, you will go and kill the enemy?
To fight for her Highness' sake.
To defeat the enemy for the country's sake.
No matter how you phrase it, it is still murder!
I do not want my students to go through that experience.
Please do not say you will go to war.
It is not fun to assault a school if there are only kids there.
No, I heard there are only girls at the school right now.
It does not matter if they are women.
We will bring death to them all.
Nothing, I just thought I saw something move.
It is not even light out yet...
Two came to our rooms, too.
Looks like they are dogs from Albion.
Okay, armour up and follow me!
Saito-kun, you stay here and protect Miss Valliere.
They have occupied the dormitory wing!
They are assembling in the cafeteria...
Damn it, they have hostages in their hands...
Do not worry about it, go to bed.
I will wake you up if something happens.
To come to the academy instead of the front line...
It all means nothing to me.
It is what my employer wants.
I see, you are only a mercenary who is moved by money.
As long as you do not do anything to hinder us,
we will not take your lives.
Do you want to turn into ashes?
Can you make due with only myself?
I want you to release the students.
I am sorry, but you will not do.
The country will not move for you.
I am the first-born daughter of the La Valliere family.
My father is an aristocrat with influence in this country.
There should not be any problems.
I shall become a hostage as well,
I like your spirit, but two is not enough.
I need all of the students.
With the lives of all the aristocrats' daughters in danger,
Queen Henrietta will have to give us a thought.
We are Her Highness' Musketeer Force!
We have you surrounded with my unit!
If you surrender, we will not kill you!
We have hostages in hand, though.
What is it that you want?!
This is not a political target, nor are there any weapons stored here.
This is only an academy of magic.
You guys stay on watch here!
No, Colbert-sensei told us to stay here.
I am worried because he is not coming back!
It opened, so what is the big deal?
Then why is your Musketeer Force stationed here?
To Tristain, this is a treasure chest filled with people of Tristain's future.
Maybe I will kill one person to test that.
I will show them that we are serious.
You think you can beat me?
I will not lose to a coward who takes hostages!
Personally, I do not like taking hostages.
Rather than going through the trouble, I would burn everything.
I burned an entire village once before.
The sight of the fire engulfing everything was breathtaking!
That is what is great about war.
You guys sure took your time to show up, Valliere and Saito.
Oh, you are a survivor of that village?
You are one person I will never forgive!
Looks like you are more skilled with swords than myself.
You are only a plebeian in the end!
Kirche, do you know how many of them there are?
I do not think there are too many of them.
We need to hurry and save them.
I looked all over for you.
Sensei, everyone is been taken hostage.
You guys get out of here now.
They have to come all the way from the palace, do not they?
We have got to handle this.
You will not be a match for them!
We need to wait until the reinforcements arrive.
You all get out of here.
I do not need a coward.
If you want to run, then please do.
I was only the vice-captain at the time.
He was referred to as Enjya.
He is more cruel than myself,
and possessed a flame that burned everything.
I am in search of that man myself!
That man who inflicted a wound upon me...
I want to burn that man...!
That is all I wish for!
We need to save everyone, fast!
If you want to meet me again next week, then sit tightly and wait!
